participant_1.name: Emily Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily enjoys the simple pleasures in life and often finds joy in the beauty of nature.
participant_1.background: I live in my parents basement. I am a vegetarian. I like cats. I work in a flower shop. I read a lot of used books.

participant_2.name: Michael Chen
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Michael thrives in fast-paced environments and enjoys connecting with others through sports.
participant_2.background: I rent an apartment. I work in finance. I live walking distance from work. I enjoy playing soccer.
